column3: Beggin' your pardons, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, but if it's a room you're here for, I'll have to ask you to wait.
Or is there some other way in which I can assist you?
What would you like to do?
Well, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, some might say that Cloud Nine is an Ishgardian institution. Been here longer than most folk can remember, we have.
There's some debate as to the meanin' of the name. Some say it's 'cause sleepin' in a bed of ours is like being wrapped in linens made of clouds.
Others think anyone who believes that rubbish ought to try spendin' a night in the Brume.
Me, I say a bed's a bed. I think ours are better than most, but I'm not about to get into a pissin' contest to prove it─ Er, beggin' your pardons, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.

A fine <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>evenin'<Else/>mornin'</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>day<Else/>evenin'</If></If> to you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. How may I assist you?
What would you like to do?
Yes, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. Very good, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. Right this way, if it please.
Generally speakin', <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, what you do in the privacy of your own room is none of our concern, so long as it doesn't disturb our other guests.
Certain activities which invariably produce, er...loud noises, for instance, are expressly prohibited. You understand, I'm sure.
Synthesis, repairs, and materia melding cannot be performed inside inn rooms.
Well, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, some might say that Cloud Nine is an Ishgardian institution. Been here longer than most folk can remember, we have.

There's some debate as to the meanin' of the name. Some say it's 'cause sleepin' in a bed of ours is like being wrapped in linens made of clouds. Others think anyone who believes that rubbish ought to try spendin' a night in the Brume.
Me, I say a bed's a bed. I think ours are better than most, but I'm not about to get into a pissin' contest to prove it─ Er, beggin' your pardons, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.
